CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages
CurrentVersion.description: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note: We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insightful Policy Performance
CurrentVersion.description: The Communication Compliance homepage provides two columns that offer a quick overview of policy performance: the first column shows the number of scanned parent items in real time, giving visibility into scanning progress; the second column keeps you informed about parent items that meet policy conditions, ensuring you stay updated on potential issues requiring attention and maintaining control over communication compliance. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Follow a meeting in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Follow is a new meeting response (RSVP) option that goes beyond the traditional Accept, Tentative and Decline choices geared towards individuals with high meeting loads and conflicting meetings each day. Follow is the ideal RSVP option for meetings you can't attend but still want to stay engaged and receive info about. Other attendees will be able to see if you are following a meeting. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Policy template limit increase
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, the maximum number of policies for each insider risk policy template increases from 5 to 20. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The clouds were incorrect and have now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. 2nd Note: The status and launch phase were incorrect and are now updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enhancements to app and risky browsing activity evidence
CurrentVersion.description: This update provides two enhancements to app and risky browsing activities that may lead to a data security incident in forensic evidence. Admins with appropriate permissions will no longer need to enable browsing indicators from the insider risk settings page to gain visual insights of these activities. In addition, the feature has been updated with more precise detection when users switch between tabs and windows. This results in more reliable visual evidence insights when context is switched in the browser. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been corrected. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Catch Up Improvements on Web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Catch Up allows you to stay in sync with your collaborators in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint by showing you the latest comment activity that is directed at you and a summary of recent changes. Based on your feedback, we made improvements to the Catch Up feature. The comment activity directed at you will now persist in Catch Up between sessions for up to 28 days. New items will be indicated with a blue dot for clarity. You can also dismiss items individually if you do not wish to keep them in Catch Up.

CurrentVersion.description: Currently, users with Microsoft 365 licenses can view projects shared with them by users of Microsoft Project for the web. This update will enable Microsoft 365 users to collaborate more seamlessly with Project users by editing shared projects. The added capabilities enable Microsoft 365 users to access any functionality where Microsoft Planner and Microsoft Project for the web overlap. Note: This feature is specific to projects that are created within the default environment, such as by using project.microsoft.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Recommended actions for finetuning policies
CurrentVersion.description:
,We are introducing additional recommended actions to provide guidance on fine-tuning your insider risk policies and implementing advanced configurations.
These new tasks and journeys will be accessible through the Recommended Actions page. 
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Browsed to generative AI websites indicator
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this update, we are adding a new indicator, “browsed to generative AI sites,” for the risky browser usage policy template, giving visibility into organizational usage of generative AI domains. User information is pseudonymized by default with strong privacy controls in place to protect end user trust. While visiting one of these AI domains may be authorized by an organization, this indicator is designed to help ensure they are correctly accounting for whether and how, these sites may be accessed in policies. CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

IT Admins can configure the default chat experience for a room, and users can make in-meeting changes to show or hide the chat using the touch console.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Sales plugin for Copilot in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can enable the Copilot for Sales plugin in the plugin menu. All plugins are toggled ‘off’ by default, and users can toggle it ‘on’ from the plugin menu. When Copilot for Sales plugin is set to ‘on,’ Copilot in Teams meetings will be able to access Sales and Dynamics 365 data to return insights for a summary of the sales opportunity for the meeting based on the transcript, as well as retrieve brand information for the account from Dynamics 365 if the account name was mentioned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot: Pinned chats
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users of Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat can easily return to their recent chats and organize their work in Microsoft Copilot. With the new pinned chats feature, they can pin up to 15 chats for easy access later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider Risk Management supports multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description: ,Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip and oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
OldVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: EML, MSG, and OFT File Support in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: EML, MSG, and OFT files type support will enable users to open "*,eml", "*.oft", and "*.msg" files in the new Outlook by dragging-and-dropping them onto the reading pane, or by double-clicking on them, or by using the Open With menu option in File Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: OneDrive – Share Word Documents with AI summary
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now opt to include an AI-generated document summary inside the share dialog when they share a Word document with other users. The document summary is included in the share notification email sent to the recipient(s) giving them more context around the contents of the shared document. This feature is only enabled for customers with a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and works only when sharing a Word for the web file.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Drag to order list items
CurrentVersion.description: Easily organize your list by dragging and dropping items into a custom sort order for you and your team.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Enhancements for eDiscovery support of Loop content
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins can review Loop components created in Outlook or Teams within eDiscovery (Premium) as rendered HTML files to help understand the content that has been created within the Loop component. Once the component has been reviewed, it can then be exported as an HTML file to meet the requirements of the case.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
CurrentVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Streamlined False positive submission for Quarantined files from OneDrive, Teams, and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: We are providing an easy and robust way  for Admins and security operators to submit and temporary mitigate False positive files that have been Quarantined from the OneDrive, Teams and SharePoint workload.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
CurrentVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New search UI for contacts and global address list
CurrentVersion.description: A new in-flow experience for searching contacts and the global address list while addressing mail and calendar events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 4K local HDMI content sharing quality for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Users can see HDMI content in 4K quality on Teams Rooms on Android devices that support 4K HDMI input, when they share content without joining a Teams meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings with a QR code on Teams Rooms on Android using Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Users can quickly join a meeting from a Teams Room even without forwarding the invite to the room calendar by scanning a QR code using their mobile device camera. The user will then enter the Teams mobile companion mode experience on their mobile. The QR code is found on the Teams Room home screen and can also be scanned to start an ad-hoc meeting or cast content from their mobile to the Teams Room display. If the user does not have the Teams mobile app, they will be directed to download it after scanning the QR code. IT admins can control the QR code feature in the device settings and the Teams admin center. The feature supports cross-tenant meetings when the organization and user policies allow it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Give feedback for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The Help button includes a Give feedback option that lets users share their opinions and ideas about Teams Rooms with Microsoft. We use this feedback to improve the Teams experience. IT admins can enable or disable this feature for users and manage feedback policies using PowerShell.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Home screen refresh for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Rooms on Android home screen matches the look and feel of Teams Rooms on Windows, enabling users to engage with a consistent Teams Rooms interface. The touch console features six action buttons and shows the room calendar on the right side of the home screen. A room tip appears at the bottom left corner of the front of room display for user education.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options updates for town halls
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting options for a town hall are now accessible within the town hall setup in Teams. Organizers can edit meeting options in an inline window within the scheduling form in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 4K display UI scaling for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: 4K-enabled displays, including front of room displays and touch boards, are natively supported on the Teams Rooms experience. Additional disclosure: 4K video is not supported.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: new Teams is now part of Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The new Teams app is now supported on Teams Rooms on Windows, allowing all Teams Rooms devices to optimize room experience and render intelligent audio and video more reliably.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Employee learning API content sync
CurrentVersion.description: Content Sync API, which enables learning content hosted on learning systems to show up across the Viva Learning user experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning employee learning API Content sync
OldVersion.description: Content Sync API, which enables learning content hosted on learning systems to show up across the Viva Learning user experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Browser-optimized playback for SAP SuccessFactors content
CurrentVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Browser optimized playback for SuccessFactors content in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Academies in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Academies in Viva Learning provide a guided learning experience to employees to improve their skills.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Academies in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Academies in Viva Learning provide a guided learning experience to employees to improve their skills.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - learning path creation
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can create learning paths from learning objects in Viva Learning. Learning paths are discoverable, consumable, and shareable by employees at the organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: learning path creation
OldVersion.description: ,Admins can create learning paths from learning objects in Viva Learning. Learning paths are discoverable, consumable, and shareable by employees at the organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status for mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status for mobile
OldVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Configure learning academies
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create and manage learning academies in the Viva Learning Admin tab.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Configure learning academies
OldVersion.description: Admins can create and manage learning academies in the Viva Learning Admin tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Progress tracking for learning paths
CurrentVersion.description: Now in Viva Learning, users will be able to track their progress on different courses within the Learning path.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Progress tracking for Learning paths
OldVersion.description: Now in Viva Learning, users will be able to track their progress on different courses within the Learning path.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manual course completion
CurrentVersion.description: Users can mark a course as complete in Viva learning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manual course completion
OldVersion.description:
Users can mark a course as complete in Viva
learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Employee learning API learner record sync
CurrentVersion.description: Assignments and learner records sync from providers/LMS connected to Viva Learning through the employee learning API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manage learning providers in Viva Learning admin tab
CurrentVersion.description: ,Learning admins can manage the configured learning providers in Viva Learning admin tab. This feature will provide a detailed sync status as well as sync logs in case of a failed sync.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Configure permissions by provider
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure permission settings for Viva Learning content by learning provider, ie. hide all content from a certain connected learning provider from certain users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Forms app replaced by Polls app in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description:
,
The new "Polls" app will soon replace the "Forms" app for enhanced polling options in Teams meetings. The "Forms" app will continue to support surveys only. We recommend you add “Polls” to your next Teams meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manage and curate interest inventory for your tenant
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can curate interest inventory for their tenant, enabling learners with personalized experience to pursue learning with these interests.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/viva/learning/interests

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals in People Profile Cards
CurrentVersion.description: View other users' OKRs and goals in Viva Goals from their user profile cards in Outlook (when enabled).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Export API
CurrentVersion.description:
,
The Export function plays an integral role in eDiscovery. After a review set is added, with use of this Export API, organizations can create export jobs and get the download URL to successfully download the export created in a programmatic manner. This API will enable external applications and partners to successfully integrate the eDiscovery export function through scripting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Labeling email from attachments' label in Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Outlook on the web will match the highest sensitivity label from attachments on email. Admin could configure this either use the cmdlet set-labelpolicy advanced setting or use the Compliance portal to configure the label policy(Roadmap: 100158). Customer will see automatically or recommendations that email gets the higher label from attachments' label.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add learning to calendar on Viva Learning mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Add to Calendar mobile feature will help learners on the Viva Learning mobile app add learning content to their calendars and block focused time for learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Configure permissions by mail-enabled security group
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure user permissions for learning content by security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Search relevance improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Improvements to relevancy of search results in Viva Learning including attribute boosting, spell correction, exact match, and personalized results based on interests.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Additional filters for search results
CurrentVersion.description: Viva learning will be supporting more Filters on Language, Content Type and Source fields in Search results page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Animated Backgrounds in Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The dynamic background feature in Teams Meetings allows users to replace their existing background with a dynamic animation for a more immersive virtual environment. It offers various options to enhance meeting experience with creativity and personalization according to their preferences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages
CurrentVersion.description: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note: We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insightful Policy Performance
CurrentVersion.description: The Communication Compliance homepage provides two columns that offer a quick overview of policy performance: the first column shows the number of scanned parent items in real time, giving visibility into scanning progress; the second column keeps you informed about parent items that meet policy conditions, ensuring you stay updated on potential issues requiring attention and maintaining control over communication compliance. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Download learner's progress data
CurrentVersion.description: Allow admins to download learners progress data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Bring your own content to learning collections with external URL support
CurrentVersion.description: Users can add content using external links from sources like YouTube, Vimeo, news articles, etc while creating learning collections.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Share an Update to Outlook with Goal Broadcast
CurrentVersion.description: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to change retention period on labels set to start retention based on “When items were labeled”
CurrentVersion.description: Previously, admins could not change the retention period set on existing labels configured to start retention from when items were labeled. This feature will remove this restriction, and the resulting behavior will be consistent with other retention label types.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Follow a meeting in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Follow is a new meeting response (RSVP) option that goes beyond the traditional Accept, Tentative and Decline choices geared towards individuals with high meeting loads and conflicting meetings each day. Follow is the ideal RSVP option for meetings you can't attend but still want to stay engaged and receive info about. Other attendees will be able to see if you are following a meeting. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Policy template limit increase
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, the maximum number of policies for each insider risk policy template increases from 5 to 20. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The clouds were incorrect and have now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. 2nd Note: The status and launch phase were incorrect and are now updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
CurrentVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Increased synergy between webapp and Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to easily switch within Viva Learning Teams app and Webapp.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Engagement information in Teams Attendance Report (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Enables meeting organizers to view meeting engagement data such as total reactions, raised hands, cameras turned on, and more in the ‘Attendance’ tab after a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Language selection for users
CurrentVersion.description: Users can select their preferred language within the Viva learning Setting Menu, independent of Teams or Browser language. Preferred language will be persisted across all Viva Learning Surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Microsoft Shell integration in Viva Learning webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an Application Header similar to other Microsoft M365 webapps. It will help users to easily switch between Microsoft webapps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
CurrentVersion.description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Proficiency level content filter
CurrentVersion.description: Users can filter content based on the proficiency level of the content—Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for display logic
CurrentVersion.description: Improved self service; Ability to enable if/then questions on surveys and support display logic.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for SFTP file transfer
CurrentVersion.description: Improved self service for admins to setup SFTP for file transfer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Improved error messaging
CurrentVersion.description: Improved error messaging during people import process.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability we are extending the Admin Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enhancements to app and risky browsing activity evidence
CurrentVersion.description: This update provides two enhancements to app and risky browsing activities that may lead to a data security incident in forensic evidence. Admins with appropriate permissions will no longer need to enable browsing indicators from the insider risk settings page to gain visual insights of these activities. In addition, the feature has been updated with more precise detection when users switch between tabs and windows. This results in more reliable visual evidence insights when context is switched in the browser. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been corrected. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit webinar details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - In-app search relevance improvement to increase matching results
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning in-app Search will be improved to show more relevant and matching results at the top.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Administrative units support
CurrentVersion.description:
,Administrative units allow admins with appropriate permissions to subdivide the organization into smaller units, and then assign specific admins or role groups that can manage only the members of those units. For example, German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users, and German investigators can only investigate alerts and activities from only German users.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Policy insights
CurrentVersion.description: The Communication Compliance homepage will provide two columns that offer a quick overview of policy performance: the first column shows the number of scanned parent items in real time, giving visibility into scanning progress; the second column keeps you informed about parent items that meet policy conditions, ensuring you stay updated on potential issues requiring attention and maintaining control over communication compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Simulation mode for DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this capability, Admins will be able to try a Microsoft Purview DLP policy, assess its impact, and fine tune the policy as required in an isolated experience. This will help Admins build confidence in the configuration of the policy and reduce the policy enforcement time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data loss prevention - Updated admin experience for settings
CurrentVersion.description: We are improving the admin experience to manage Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention settings including the endpoint settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data loss prevention - Updated admin experience for settings
CurrentVersion.description: We are improving the admin experience to manage Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention settings including the endpoint settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Teams Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Teams. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 15 new Microsoft Teams events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MeetingParticipantDetail; 2. MessageSent; 3. MessagesListed; 4. MeetingDetail; 5. MessageUpdated; 6. ChatRetrieved; 7. MessageRead; 8. MessageHostedContentRead; 9. ChatCreated; 10. ChatUpdated; 11. MessageCreatedNotification; 12. MessageDeletedNotification; 13. MessageUpdatedNotification; 14. SubscribedToMessages; 15. MessageHostedContentsListed

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Teams Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Teams. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 15 new Microsoft Teams events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MeetingParticipantDetail; 2. MessageSent; 3. MessagesListed; 4. MeetingDetail; 5. MessageUpdated; 6. ChatRetrieved; 7. MessageRead; 8. MessageHostedContentRead; 9. ChatCreated; 10. ChatUpdated; 11. MessageCreatedNotification; 12. MessageDeletedNotification; 13. MessageUpdatedNotification; 14. SubscribedToMessages; 15. MessageHostedContentsListed

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Exchange and SharePoint Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 4 new Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MailItemsAccessed; 2. Send; 3. SearchQueryInitiatedExchange; 4. SearchQueryInitiatedSharepoint; The following logs will differ based upon the user’s license. This following additional metadata is added to Exchange logs when the user is assigned an Audit Premium license: Premium Insight 1: SensitivityLabel for MailItemsAccessed

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Catch Up Improvements on Web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Catch Up allows you to stay in sync with your collaborators in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint by showing you the latest comment activity that is directed at you and a summary of recent changes. Based on your feedback, we made improvements to the Catch Up feature. The comment activity directed at you will now persist in Catch Up between sessions for up to 28 days. New items will be indicated with a blue dot for clarity. You can also dismiss items individually if you do not wish to keep them in Catch Up.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows -  New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
CurrentVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Additional capabilities for Microsoft 365 users in Microsoft Project for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, users with Microsoft 365 licenses can view projects shared with them by users of Microsoft Project for the web. This update will enable Microsoft 365 users to collaborate more seamlessly with Project users by editing shared projects. The added capabilities enable Microsoft 365 users to access any functionality where Microsoft Planner and Microsoft Project for the web overlap. Note: This feature is specific to projects that are created within the default environment, such as by using project.microsoft.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Controls for enterprise secure AI
CurrentVersion.description:
,
The Microsoft Edge management service will give admins the controls to manage settings for Enterprise AI features, including Copilot in Edge.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Recommended actions for finetuning policies
CurrentVersion.description:
,We are introducing additional recommended actions to provide guidance on fine-tuning your insider risk policies and implementing advanced configurations.
These new tasks and journeys will be accessible through the Recommended Actions page. 
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Browsed to generative AI websites indicator
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this update, we are adding a new indicator, “browsed to generative AI sites,” for the risky browser usage policy template, giving visibility into organizational usage of generative AI domains. User information is pseudonymized by default with strong privacy controls in place to protect end user trust. While visiting one of these AI domains may be authorized by an organization, this indicator is designed to help ensure they are correctly accounting for whether and how, these sites may be accessed in policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Draft by Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can now help you draft new messages or replies.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Admin apps pinned by default in Mail Compose and Read
CurrentVersion.description: When an app is deployed in Integrated Apps (Get Apps & Upload Custom LOB apps) in the Microsoft Admin Center, it will be available in Outlook on the web in Read Message Actions and Compose Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Newsletters
CurrentVersion.description: ,Newsletters in Outlook enable customers to create, distribute, and track success for their internal email newsletters. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Weekly active user reporting
CurrentVersion.description: Total number of unique users who have launched the Viva Learning personal app in the last 7 days.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Chat shown by default in Gallery View for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting Chat is now shown by default when joining a Teams meeting with Teams Rooms on Windows in Gallery View, making it easier to see incoming chat messages on the front of room display. IT Admins can configure the default chat experience for a room, and users can make in-meeting changes to show or hide the chat using the touch console.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Chat shown by default in Gallery View for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting Chat is now shown by default when joining a Teams meeting with Teams Rooms on Windows in Gallery View, making it easier to see incoming chat messages on the front of room display. IT Admins can configure the default chat experience for a room, and users can make in-meeting changes to show or hide the chat using the touch console.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View, download and delete OneDrive transcript files in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: We are simplifying the storage and management of meeting transcript files by focusing transcript actions such as view, download, and delete to source from one place (OneDrive for Business) instead of two places (OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Popups enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are expanding the functionality of oversharing popups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support the following: 1) Additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled, Message/Attachment is not labeled, and File extension is, and 2) Customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business Opens in-app for Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Previously, the OneDrive button in Outlook opened a new tab for OneDrive; with this change, you will see OneDrive inline for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Sales plugin for Copilot in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can enable the Copilot for Sales plugin in the plugin menu. All plugins are toggled ‘off’ by default, and users can toggle it ‘on’ from the plugin menu. When Copilot for Sales plugin is set to ‘on,’ Copilot in Teams meetings will be able to access Sales and Dynamics 365 data to return insights for a summary of the sales opportunity for the meeting based on the transcript, as well as retrieve brand information for the account from Dynamics 365 if the account name was mentioned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot: Pinned chats
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users of Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat can easily return to their recent chats and organize their work in Microsoft Copilot. With the new pinned chats feature, they can pin up to 15 chats for easy access later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Adding topics to posts in Viva Engage will default open for question post types and be aligned with new topic experiences as seen in Answers in Viva.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider Risk Management supports multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description: ,Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip and oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Saved views in Activity explorer
CurrentVersion.description: During an alert investigation, analysts usually use various filters and columns in activity explorer to understand the risk activities that may lead to potential data security incidents. With this update, an Insider Risk Management analyst can quickly use a previously configured combination of filters and columns with one click. This can help analysts efficiently work through recurring activities without manually setting up filters every time. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Simulation mode for DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this capability, Admins will be able to try a Microsoft Purview DLP policy, assess its impact, and fine tune the policy as required in an isolated environment. This will help Admins build confidence in the configuration of the policy and reduce the policy enforcement time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: EML, MSG, and OFT File Support
CurrentVersion.description: EML, MSG, and OFT files type support will enable users to open "*,eml", "*.oft", and "*.msg" files in the new Outlook by dragging-and-dropping them onto the reading pane, or by double-clicking on them, or by using the Open With menu option in File Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: EML, MSG, and OFT File Support in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: EML, MSG, and OFT files type support will enable users to open "*,eml", "*.oft", and "*.msg" files in the new Outlook by dragging-and-dropping them onto the reading pane, or by double-clicking on them, or by using the Open With menu option in File Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: OneDrive – Share Word Documents with AI summary
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now opt to include an AI-generated document summary inside the share dialog when they share a Word document with other users. The document summary is included in the share notification email sent to the recipient(s) giving them more context around the contents of the shared document. This feature is only enabled for customers with a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and works only when sharing a Word for the web file.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Drag to order list items
CurrentVersion.description: Easily organize your list by dragging and dropping items into a custom sort order for you and your team.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Enhancements for eDiscovery support of Loop content
CurrentVersion.description: Now eDiscovery admins can review Loop components created in Outlook or Teams within eDiscovery (Premium) as rendered HTML files to help understand the content that has been created within the Loop component. Once the component has been reviewed, it can then be exported as an HTML file to meet the requirements of the case.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
CurrentVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Streamlined False positive submission for Quarantined files from OneDrive, Teams, and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: We are providing an easy and robust way  for Admins and security operators to submit and temporary mitigate False positive files that have been Quarantined from the OneDrive, Teams and SharePoint workload.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
CurrentVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New search UI for contacts and global address list
CurrentVersion.description: A new in-flow experience for searching contacts and the global address list while addressing mail and calendar events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 4K local HDMI content sharing quality for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Users can see HDMI content in 4K quality on Teams Rooms on Android devices that support 4K HDMI input, when they share content without joining a Teams meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings with a QR code on Teams Rooms on Android using Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Users can quickly join a meeting from a Teams Room even without forwarding the invite to the room calendar by scanning a QR code using their mobile device camera. The user will then enter the Teams mobile companion mode experience on their mobile. The QR code is found on the Teams Room home screen and can also be scanned to start an ad-hoc meeting or cast content from their mobile to the Teams Room display. If the user does not have the Teams mobile app, they will be directed to download it after scanning the QR code. IT admins can control the QR code feature in the device settings and the Teams admin center. The feature supports cross-tenant meetings when the organization and user policies allow it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Give feedback for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The Help button includes a Give feedback option that lets users share their opinions and ideas about Teams Rooms with Microsoft. We use this feedback to improve the Teams experience. IT admins can enable or disable this feature for users and manage feedback policies using PowerShell.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Home screen refresh for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Rooms on Android home screen matches the look and feel of Teams Rooms on Windows, enabling users to engage with a consistent Teams Rooms interface. The touch console features six action buttons and shows the room calendar on the right side of the home screen. A room tip appears at the bottom left corner of the front of room display for user education.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options updates for town halls
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting options for a town hall are now accessible within the town hall setup in Teams. Organizers can edit meeting options in an inline window within the scheduling form in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 4K display UI scaling for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: 4K-enabled displays, including front of room displays and touch boards, are natively supported on the Teams Rooms experience. Additional disclosure: 4K video is not supported.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: new Teams is now part of Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The new Teams app is now supported on Teams Rooms on Windows, allowing all Teams Rooms devices to optimize room experience and render intelligent audio and video more reliably.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Employee learning API content sync
CurrentVersion.description: Content Sync API, which enables learning content hosted on learning systems to show up across the Viva Learning user experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Browser-optimized playback for SAP SuccessFactors content
CurrentVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Academies in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Academies in Viva Learning provide a guided learning experience to employees to improve their skills.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - learning path creation
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can create learning paths from learning objects in Viva Learning. Learning paths are discoverable, consumable, and shareable by employees at the organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status for mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Configure learning academies
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create and manage learning academies in the Viva Learning Admin tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Progress tracking for learning paths
CurrentVersion.description: Now in Viva Learning, users will be able to track their progress on different courses within the Learning path.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manual course completion
CurrentVersion.description: Users can mark a course as complete in Viva learning.
